body.description: Enjoy radiant, glossy color for up to 60 days. Our unique TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Color System, with Anti-Fade advanced technology, helps to control frizz while keeping your style effortlessly smooth. This sulfate-free shampoo gently cleanses your color-treated hair, smoothing frizz from root to tip, while sealing in shine to keep your hair vibrant and glossy for up to 60 days. This shampoo for color-treated hair delivers superior salon-quality results with every wash. TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Color Shampoo for color-treated hair, with Anti-Fade, prolongs and maximizes the time between coloring, leaving hair radiant and glossy for up to 60 days. Formulated with amino acids and ceramide, this salon-level Pro Style Technology makes hair 3x stronger, 3x more manageable, and resistant from breakage (vs. a non-conditioning shampoo). Make your hair the perfect style canvas with this shampoo. How to use: Step 1: Apply TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Color Shampoo to wet hair, gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather. Step 2: Lightly squeeze the shampoo from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. Step 3: Finish with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Color Conditioner and style with your favorite TRESemmé products. This TRESemmé shampoo is free from Sulfates, Parabens, Mineral Oils, and DMDM Hydantoin. We've always understood that style is more than a look, it's a powerful tool to help you achieve your dreams. With our professional quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at TRESemmé, from the values we promote-such as not testing on animals and being PETA-approved-to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made to give you professional salon quality haircare products you can trust. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With TRESemmé, you can DO IT WITH STYLE.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with the right wash and care foundation. TRESemme Pro Style Tech, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. with continued use.

GLOSSY, RADIANT COLOR Our sulfate-free Keratin Smooth Color System, with Anti-Fade, prolongs and maximizes the time between coloring, leaving hair radiant and glossy for up to 60 days. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create any style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA-approved cruelty free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil and DMDM Hydantoin. TRESemme– Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022 PROFESSIONAL, SALON QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemme is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want. So you can do it with style.

TRESemme Keratin Smooth Color Conditioner, 20 oz TRESemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo, 20 oz TRESemme Keratin Smooth Conditioner, 20 oz Main Benefits Our sulfate-free Keratin Smooth Color System, with Anti-Fade, prolongs and maximizes the time between coloring, leaving hair radiant and glossy for up to 60 days. Get up to 72 hours of frizz control with our Keratin Smooth System. Made with Lamellar-Discipline, this shampoo helps transform frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look. Looking for smooth, sleek strands? Our Keratin Smooth System, with Lamellar-Discipline, transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours.
TRESemme– Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very odd consistency, almost jelly like. Also did not protect my hair color any better than a normal shampoo. Not much lather no matter how much I used, almost like it was diluted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Both the shampoo and conditioner are terrible. The shampoo has no lather yet it somehow managed to strip ALL of the moisture out of my hair. Then, I had to use like half the bottle of conditioner to get ANY of that moisture back but it still came out dry and brittle. On top of that, I had a BUNCH of hair fall out and acne in my hairline - presumably bc it made my hair so dry. I'd stay away from this for sure!
